title: Application Process | UIC Admissions
text: Learn all about UIC. Explore which programs are a good fit for your goals. Find out about financial aid options. The more you know, the easier it will be to navigate the application process.
Keep track of all deadlines that apply to you. Keep in mind, some programs and departments, such as GPPA and Honors College have their own deadlines.
Familiarize yourself with admission requirements, including department, test, and course requirements, as soon as possible.
Your application essay and recommendations are an opportunity to make your application stand out. Starting early ensures you and your recommenders have adequate time to meet deadlines.
Before submitting your application, make sure you check requirements & deadlines for specific requirements based on how you are applying.
You can check your status online. This is where you’ll find a checklist of items we’ve received and which items are still outstanding.
You'll receive a decision by email or mail within the time frames below.
Follow this newly admitted student checklist to help you stay on track and take advantage of all UIC has to offer.
The graduate and professional application process is paperless. Please do not mail materials unless expressly requested.Contact Graduate and Professional Admissions
